name: puhelinluettelonbackend
description: Exercise submissions for [Full stack open 2020](https://fullstackopen.com/en) course by University of Helsinki.

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../full_stack_2020/osa2/puhelinluettelo && npm run build --prod && cp -r build ../../../full_stack_2020_osa3/
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push && npm run deploy

author: Esa Mäkipää
